Join the Northern Panhandle Chapter for Our January 28 meeting.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

During the December 17 meeting of the Northern Panhandle chapter, the bylaws committee proposed changes to the existing bylaws. Most notably, changes were proposed regarding the officer/board dynamic as well as the removal of the position of treasurer, as the chapter is prohibited from raising or soliciting funds.

The intent behind the revisions is to tailor the bylaws to the working functions of the chapter and to clarify the language to be better understood. We would ask that anyone interested in participating please review the changes and bring any questions or concerns to our next meeting when the chapter will vote on the approval of the revised bylaws.

Northern Panhandle Chapter Meeting

Discuss ACLU issues and how you can get involved with our work across the state.

Monday, January 28, 5:30 p.m.
Ohio County Public Library
52 16th Street.
Wheeling, WV 260003

RSVP ON FACEBOOK


If you have any questions about participating in the chapter or the bylaw changes, you can contact the chapter through the Facebook page or at acluwvnp@gmail.com.

We hope to see you there!

Rosemary Ketchum, ACLU-WV Northern Panhandle Chapter President
